metadata.title: CVE-2024-36020 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i40e: fix vf may be used uninitialized in this function warningTo fix the regression introduced by commit 52424f974bc5, which causesservers hang in very hard to reproduce conditions with resets races.Using two sources for the information is the root cause.In this function before the fix bumping v didn't mean bumping vfpointer. But the code used this variables interchangeably, so stale vfcould point to different/not intended vf.Remove redundant "v" variable and iterate via single VF pointer acrosswhole function instead to guarantee VF pointer validity.
